step1.title: Connect Your Page

protectBrand.description: Maintain a professional presence with consistent, on-brand responses. Filter inappropriate content automatically.

fastReplies.title: Fast Replies
fastReplies.description: Respond to comments instantly, 24/7. Never miss an opportunity to engage with your audience again.

trust.title: Safe Automation, Full Control

secure.title: Secure & Private

control.title: Full Control
control.description: Review, edit, or override any AI response. Pause automation anytime with one click.

customRules.title: Custom Rules
customRules.description: Define your own moderation policies, keywords, and response guidelines to match your needs.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: See detailed logs of every action. Know exactly what AI is doing on your behalf.
